"""
Chapter 3
"""

```{julia}
using LinearAlgebra

# Norm
x = [ 2, -1, 2 ];
norm(x)
sqrt(x'*x)

#Triangle inequality
#Let’s check the triangle inequality, ‖x+ y‖ ≤ ‖x‖+ ‖y‖, for some specific values of x and y.
x = randn(10); y = randn(10);
lhs = norm(x+y)
rhs = norm(x) + norm(y)
lhs,rhs

# Distance
u = [1.8, 2.0, -3.7, 4.7];
v = [0.6, 2.1, 1.9, -1.4];
w = [2.0, 1.9, -4.0, 4.6];
norm(u-v), norm(u-w), norm(v-w)

# Function 'coso'
coso(x,y) =x'*y/(norm(x)*norm(y))
a = [1,2,-1]; b=[2,0,-3]

coso(a,b)
```
